T.query: select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and s.size_mb >1 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.instance_name = 'SQLEXPRESS' and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public'

F.query: select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and s.size_mb >0 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.instance_name = 'SQLEXPRESS' and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public'

select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and s.size_mb >=1 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.instance_name = 'SQLEXPRESS' and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public'

select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and s.size_mb >1 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.instance_name = 'SQLEXPRESS' and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public' and s.stat_id >  50000

select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and i.application_id >1 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.instance_name = 'SQLEXPRESS' and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public'

select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and s.size_mb >1 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public'

select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id where  s.instance_id >132  and s.size_mb >=1 and i.is_running = 't' and s.idx_scan =0 and i.environment = 'production' and s.bloat_ratio  >0  and i.version <> 'unknown' and s.idx_blks_hit_ratio>0 and s.schemaname ='public'
